reviewText: Videos on combative self defense is supurbly done by Mr. Donvito and Pladin press. Mr Donvito gives simple explanatory lessons that are simple to learn and most important extremely effective in combative self defense. All instructional lessons Mr. Donvito simplifies and makes the self defense east to learn and deadly. Looking for more videos in the series if anybody knows were i can get them.

Video was excellently done. Great content. Teaches the L.I.N.E. system of hand to hand combat. The video is with every penny I paid for it. Ron Donvito, the creator of L.i. N.E. actually teaches it in the video.
